scenario.name: Register generated users
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [$user] <sip:[$user]@sip.example.org>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: [$user] <sip:[$user]@sip.example.org> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 3 REGISTER Contact: <sip:[$user]@[local_ip]:5063> Max-Forwards: 70 User-Agent: Linphone/Linphone-3.3.x (sipp/unknown) Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0
